prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a massive, imposing gray alien warrior, smooth yet highly textured gray skin, giant black void eyes, stoic determined expression, 8k cinematic photo, dramatic lighting
feature_prompt: extreme muscle definition, visible veins, subtle wet sheen on the gray skin, detailed texture on the combat suit fabric, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth gray skin, human skin color, doll, flat lighting, bad anatomy, low quality, blurry, friendly expression, small build
